auth.resetPasswordInstruction: Enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset your password.
auth.resetLinkSent: Reset link sent to your email!
auth.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

home.title: Modern Web Development Starter
home.subtitle: Built with Nuxt 3, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Shadcn-vue
home.description: A comprehensive starter kit featuring authentication, internationalization, and modern UI components. Get started building your next web application with the best developer experience.

features.title: Features
features.typescriptDesc: Full TypeScript integration with strict mode for better development experience
features.authenticationDesc: Complete authentication system with login, register, and password reset
features.i18nDesc: Multi-language support with easy translation management
features.uiDesc: Beautiful and accessible components built with Shadcn-vue and Tailwind CSS
features.darkModeDesc: Built-in dark mode support with smooth transitions
features.responsiveDesc: Mobile-first responsive design that works on all devices
